kit.leader_skill: "DB Saga" or "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Youth" or "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category

super_attack.name: Paper...Scissors...Rock!!!!
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF; Causes immense damage to enemy; Seals Super Attack; Unit Super Attack; Miraculous Romantic Adventure; Raises ATK & DEF; Causes immense damage; Stuns the enemy; Activation Conditions; Activated when there is an ally; whose name includes "Bulma"; attacking in the same turn

passive_skill.name: Sphere of Guidance
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "DB Saga", "Youth" or "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category ally attacking in the same turn upon the character's entry: (Once) Launches an additional Super Attack and damage reduction rate 40% up for 7 turns; (Once) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Damage reduction rate 20% up; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 100% up; 55% chance of performing a critical hit within the turn; 22% chance of evading enemy's attack within the turn; When receiving an attack: DEF 200% up; For every Super Attack performed: (Forever) ATK 50% up (up to 200%); After performing 7 or more Super Attacks in battle: (Forever) Launches an additional Super Attack; (Forever) Guards all attacks

active_skill.name: Goku Goes Fishing
active_skill.effect: Recovers 30% HP; Ki +3; ATK & DEF +30% in battle
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle (once only)
